verses.kjv: I exhort therefore, that, first of all, supplications, prayers, intercessions, and giving of thanks, be made for all men;
verses.ct: So the first thing I urge is that requests, prayers, appeals on behalf of others, and expressions of gratitude be offered for everyone —

verses.kjv: For kings, and for all that are in authority; that we may lead a quiet and peaceable life in all godliness and honesty.
verses.ct: for rulers and all people in positions of power — so that we can live calm, peaceful lives marked by devotion to God and integrity.

verses.kjv: For this is good and acceptable in the sight of God our Saviour;
verses.ct: This is something good and pleasing to God our Savior,

verses.kjv: Who will have all men to be saved, and to come unto the knowledge of the truth.
verses.ct: who wants all people to be saved and to arrive at an understanding of the truth.

verses.kjv: For there is one God, and one mediator between God and men, the man Christ Jesus;
verses.ct: Because there is one God and one go-between connecting God and humanity — the man Christ Jesus,

verses.kjv: Who gave himself a ransom for all, to be testified in due time.
verses.ct: who offered himself as a payment to free everyone. This was revealed at just the right time.

verses.kjv: Whereunto I am ordained a preacher, and an apostle, (I speak the truth in Christ, and lie not;) a teacher of the Gentiles in faith and verity.
verses.ct: For this purpose I was appointed as a preacher and an apostle — I'm telling the truth in Christ, I'm not lying — and as a teacher of the Gentiles in faith and truth.

verses.kjv: I will therefore that men pray every where, lifting up holy hands, without wrath and doubting.
verses.ct: Therefore, I want men everywhere to pray, raising up hands that are set apart for God, free from anger and doubt.

verses.kjv: In like manner also, that women adorn themselves in modest apparel, with shamefacedness and sobriety; not with broided hair, or gold, or pearls, or costly array;
verses.ct: In the same way, I want women to dress themselves in respectable clothing, with modesty and self-control — not with elaborate hairstyles, or gold jewelry, or pearls, or expensive outfits,

verses.kjv: But (which becometh women professing godliness) with good works.
verses.ct: but rather with good actions, which is what's fitting for women who claim to be devoted to God.

verses.kjv: Let the woman learn in silence with all subjection.
verses.ct: A woman should learn quietly and with complete willingness to follow instruction.

verses.kjv: But I suffer not a woman to teach, nor to usurp authority over the man, but to be in silence.
verses.ct: I don't allow a woman to teach or to exercise authority over a man; instead, she is to remain quiet.

verses.kjv: For Adam was first formed, then Eve.
verses.ct: After all, Adam was formed first, and then Eve.

verses.kjv: And Adam was not deceived, but the woman being deceived was in the transgression.
verses.ct: And it wasn't Adam who was tricked — it was the woman who was deceived and fell into sin.

verses.kjv: Notwithstanding she shall be saved in childbearing, if they continue in faith and charity and holiness with sobriety.
verses.ct: However, women will be saved through the experience of bearing children, as long as they persist in faith, love, and holiness, along with self-control.
